hero.title: We are on a mission to make AI accessible to everyone

paragraphs: We're building on a simple mission: everyone deserves a right to AI. D23 AI is built as the introduction and gateway to AI for Billions. While a majority of tech-literate folks in the US and across the world had their ChatGPT moment, in a country like India widespread adoption is yet to be seen.

We've made the first step towards this mission by launching D23 AI on WhatsApp for free. This is a voice-first offering, specializes in Indic languages supporting all major accents, and is abundantly accessible to every Indian on WhatsApp without the need for a new app or website. We're continuously adding features that make AI useful to Indians in their daily life, and also use-cases around Education, Healthcare and Creative. Join us on this exciting journey towards widespread adoption of AI.

founders.title: Building AI that speaks your language
founders.subtitle: Passionate technologists on a mission to make artificial intelligence accessible to every Indian, regardless of the language they speak or their technical background.

developers.title: Our Development Team
developers.subtitle: The talented engineers building the technology behind D23 AI
